description.en: Nano, a low-latency cryptocurrency built on an innovative block-lattice data structure offering unlimited scalability and no transaction fees. Nano by design is a simple protocol with the sole purpose of being a high-performance cryptocurrency. The Nano protocol can run on low-power hardware, allowing it to be a practical, decentralized cryptocurrency for everyday use. The original Nano (RailBlocks) paper and first beta implementation were published in December, 2014, making it one of the first Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) based cryptocurrencies [6]. Soon after, other DAG cryptocurrencies began to develop, most notably DagCoin/Byteball and IOTA. These DAG-based cryptocurrencies broke the blockchain mold, improving system performance and security. Byteball achieves consensus by relying on a “main-chain” comprised of honest, reputable and user-trusted “witnesses”, while IOTA achieves consensus via the cumulative PoW of stacked transactions. Nano achieves consensus via a balance-weighted vote on conflicting transactions. This consensus system provides quicker, more deterministic transactions while still maintaining a strong, decentralized system. Nano continues this development and has positioned itself as one of the highest performing cryptocurrencies. Nano is a trustless, feeless, low-latency cryptocurrency that utilizes a novel blocklattice structure and delegated Proof of Stake voting. The network requires minimal resources, no high-power mining hardware, and can process high transaction throughput. All of this is achieved by having individual blockchains for each account, eliminating access issues and inefficiencies of a global data-structure. We identified possible attack vectors on the system and presented arguments on how Nano is resistant to these forms of attacks. Check out CoinBureau for the complete review of Nano.

status_updates.description:
Ready for some good nano news today? 

Get up to speed on the release of Nano Node V22, join us as we welcome new team members, explore new partnerships and give you a recap of everything new in the nano Ecosystem.

https://medium.com/nanocurrency/nano-digest-may-2021-3e738cd15474

Get ready for it! Nano is coming to MarketSquare.io.

Look out for a dedicated Nano Hub, Nano videos, and much more!

Read the announcement here: www.reddit.com/r/nanocurrency/comments/n1uxmb/get_ready_for_it_nano_is_coming_to_marketsquareio/

It's here! The Nano Unity3D plugin is now available in the Unity Asset Store!

The Nano Unity3D plugin unlocks the potential for over 1.5 million developers to directly support nano in their games, a pivotal step towards global adoption.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/nano-190960

Your new Nano Digest just dropped. Join us as we catch up on everything new in the nano ecosystem.🔥

Get up to speed on recent development updates, new services, community project milestones, team updates and more...

https://medium.com/nanocurrency/nano-digest-new-exchanges-development-updates-partnerships-team-updates-and-more-510d65e15f65

Nano node V21.3 has been deployed to the nano network and is now available. Click the link for more information around the recent DoS attack and the V21.3 fixes.
https://medium.com/nanocurrency/recent-dos-nano-network-attack-and-v21-3-fixes-97b9b7297f9

LIVE in 15 minutes - Join nano founder Colin LeMahieu for an introduction to Nano. 

Be sure to download the Natrium wallet before attending. Colin will also be dropping some easter eggs on upcoming updates from the Nano Foundation. This one is not to be missed!

Register here: https://zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_zPYe_YpzRr-TePv_FwpACA

The first nano community update of 2021 is here!

Highlights include the recently announced Unblock2021 Hackathon, trending community articles, the latest community projects to enter the nano ecosystem, competitions and more...

https://medium.com/nanocurrency/nano-community-update-7db49cfcca67
